title: Textile, 1930s
medium:
Medium: cotton
Technique: hand screen printed on plain weave
inscribed: In pencil on back: Esther Kahn Age 9.
creditline: Gift of the Estate of Ella Ostrowsky
description: Slightly offset repeat of boat, water, and island scene. Printed in light blue, gold, and salmon (salmon over gold for orange, gold over blue for green, and green and salmon over gold for brown).
